summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4264 for the improvement of Ballard Avenue, from Market Street to Ione Place; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the installation of a street lighting system; and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50666, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
